ph.ph: Registers or unregisters a facial information observer.

section.title: Details
section.p: You can call this method to register the callback to receive the facial information processed by Agora speech driven extension. When calling this method to register a facial information observer, you can register callbacks in the class as needed. After successfully registering the facial information observer, the SDK triggers the callback you have registered when it captures the facial information converted by the speech driven extension.

ul.li: Ensure that you call this method before joining a channel.
Before calling this method, you need to make sure that the speech driven extension has been enabled by calling .

section.title: Applicable scenarios
section.p: Facial information processed by the Agora speech driven extension is BS (Blend Shape) data that complies with ARkit standards. You can further process the BS data using third-party 3D rendering engines, such as driving avatar to make mouth movements corresponding to speech.

pd.ph: If you need to unregister a facial information observer, pass in .

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly.

ul.props: native electron unity rn unreal bp
ul.li: < 0: Failure. See for details and resolution suggestions.
